channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric SE -- Modicon M580, Modicon M340, Modicon Quantum, Modicon Premium (see security notification for specific versions)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric SE -- Modicon M580, Modicon M340, Modicon Quantum, Modicon Premium (see security notification for specific versions)

item.title: CVE-2019-6857|2024-08-04T20:31:04.438Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- modicon%20m580%2C%20modicon%20m340%2C%20modicon%20quantum%2C%20%20modicon%20premium%20%28see%20security%20notification%20for%20specific%20versions%29
item.description: A CWE-754: Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability exists in Modicon M580, Modicon M340, Modicon Quantum, Modicon Premium (see security notification for specific versions) which could cause a Denial of Service of the controller when reading specific memory blocks using Modbus TCP.

item.title: CVE-2019-6856|2024-08-04T20:31:04.415Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- modicon%20m580%2C%20modicon%20m340%2C%20modicon%20quantum%2C%20%20modicon%20premium%20%28see%20security%20notification%20for%20specific%20versions%29
item.description: A CWE-754: Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability exists in Modicon M580, Modicon M340, Modicon Quantum, Modicon Premium (see security notification for specific versions) which could cause a Denial of Service when writing specific physical memory blocks using Modbus TCP.
